data.text: @rick_pittman Let's talk about the vaccine data dump, and about the 93% adverse reaction Chan e. Or about modern owning a schematic to the virus before it was a thing.
@rick_pittman *with* covid. Not of, making the numbers meaningless.

@mel_slurp @rick_pittman The remnants of the Spanish flu is still with us today and the coronavirus is not the same as the flu. Yes the science and stats clearly show that the vaccines have worked along with natural immunity.
@rick_pittman ...and those are the government's numbers. Actual deaths FROM covid are a fraction of this figure.
@rick_pittman And how many people live in #Canada? If people used simple mathematics, they could see a bigger picture and not freak out so much over Covid.
@Lisa7053Johanna @jimlewy @rick_pittman It's all bullcrap. I've checked the Canadian Government websites over the months. The data was inaccurate or from April 2020.
@keays_linda @rick_pittman But this is the stat that is available, we are not privy to who died "from" covid. Rick is sharing a stat from a gov't page.
@jimlewy @rick_pittman What? This table has looked like this throughout the whole pandemic, remember the first year with no vaccines? The same percentages.

@rick_pittman thank -you. I had been screen shooting this and sending to people all through this pandemic. The ones who are pro-lockdown refuse to see it, they keep saying it's "changing" to younger people and here we are 2 yrs later and it s still the same %'s.
